name: Portfolio Website
subtitle: To showcase my projects and skills
description: This is my personal portfolio website. It is a static website built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The website is hosted on GitHub Pages.
The website is responsive and mobile-friendly. It showcases my projects, skills, and contact information. It also has a blog section where I write about my projects and experiences.
I built this website to showcase my projects and skills to potential employers and clients. I also use it as a platform to share my knowledge and experiences with the community.

quotes.quote: Making it clean simple and easy to navigate is the motivation behind this project.
quotes.author: Jerry Ji
